description: This REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES. full_summary:
## Microplate Spectrophotometer Tender Notice

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 01R11-24-C042
* **Publication Date**: 31 August 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 10 October 2023 at 17:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 19 September 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 31 March 2024

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking quotations from Canadian suppliers for the supply and delivery of a Microplate Spectrophotometer. This tender is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI only.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria**
* Must be a supplier currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI
* Must meet the mandatory technical criteria outlined in the supply arrangement

### Selection and Award Criteria

* The responsive bidder holding a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

### Tendering Method

* Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Camille Sobczak
* **Email**: camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (204) 430-5426
* **Address**: 400-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada R3C 3G7

Please note that only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI may submit a bid. To qualify, suppliers must download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

We will evaluate bids based on the mandatory technical criteria outlined above. The selected bidder will be recommended for contract award.

---

You can't bid on this tender if:

* You don't have a valid Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.
* You're not pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.

 if you're interested in participating, you should download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

Kind regards, [Your Name] - Technical Writer
